Stop-loss strategy: Sell when price falls below 20 NTD or ROE < 0%
Stop loss triggered when EPS falls below -0.3 or ROE drops below 2%
Sell when the stock price falls by 15% from the current price or when the EPS turns negative for two consecutive years.
Sell when the stock price falls by 15% from the current price or when the ROE and ROA fall below -5% and -3%, respectively, in consecutive periods.
